text: Mba Fherasiŋ gumgi, mbe kha nzambaren Zisas ga mbui, “Maaŋgi tugar Fhe Bakɨme wo gumgi gu mbigi ganɨrim, mbe ana piin kɨrga tuk guigira kɨrar hɨgɨrie?” Mbe mba nzambaren Zisas ga muuŋgim, Zisas mbe ŋgarkarav khaŋ nzuai, “Fhe Bakɨme won gumgi gum mbigi ganɨnga tuk, ana bigɨn the farar muuŋgip hɨrim, nde wo rɨmgir ana gangip, kaŋgip khaŋ suaŋrie, ‘Mba tuk hɨgi?’
